content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Stone Mining Operation at position(40.0, -92.0)
Consists of:
- Three burner mining drills at positions (43.0, -92.0), (46.0, -92.0), (40.0, -92.0)
- Three wooden chests at positions (40.5, -90.5), (43.5, -90.5), (46.5, -90.5)
All drills currently out of fuel

### Coal Mining Operation at position(41.0, -82.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at position (41.0, -82.0)
Currently out of fuel

### Copper Mining Operation
Consists of:
- Wooden chest at position (-20.5, -71.5) containing 2 copper ore
- Burner mining drill at position (-18.0, -53.0) with wooden chest at (-17.5, -51.5)
Currently out of fuel

### Research Lab Setup
Consists of:
- Lab containing 15 automation science packs
- Currently without power

### Power Generation System
Consists of:
- Offshore pump at position (-9.5, 24.5) outputting water
- Multiple pipe groups:
  - Group at (-24.5, 11.5) with 56 pipes
  - Group at (-13.5, 12.5) with 9 pipes
  - Group at (-16.5, 19.5) with 12 pipes carrying water
  - Group at (-16.5, 19.5) with 1 pipe
  - Group at (-9.5, 20.5) with 6 pipes
  - Group at (-2.5, 26.5) with 13 pipes

### Electrical Distribution Network
Consists of multiple electric poles spanning from (9.5, 3.5) to (-16.5, 15.5)
Currently not powered

ERROR TIPS

### Entity Placement Errors
- Ensure target location is clear of other entities before placing new ones
- When placing connected entities like steam engines and boilers, ensure proper spacing and alignment
- Check if required connection points between entities are accessible and not blocked

### Resource and Inventory Issues
- Cannot craft items without required raw materials (e.g., stone needed for stone furnace)
- Ensure you have the item in inventory before attempting to insert it into machines
- Keep mining drills fueled to maintain resource production

### Connection Errors
- When connecting entities like boilers and steam engines, ensure connection points are properly aligned
- Clear any blocking entities or pipes that might interfere with connections
- Consider rebuilding connected structures from scratch if connections are persistently failing

### Entity Pickup Errors
- Verify entity exists at target location before attempting pickup
- Double check entity type matches what you're trying to pick up
